name: Supermarket Squire
description:
Mom gave you a shopping list, you need to get through the supermarket and get all the groceries. But the catch is you are stuck in a shopping cart, and only have whipped cream to push yourself around.

Left click to use whipped cream.

Made for Ludwig Jam - Theme: Foddian Game

This game is intentionally difficult, like a Foddian Game, but everything is possible and I encourage you to finish it. Good Luck!

Saving doesn't work on all browsers, Chrome is your best bet.

Cover art by @That_Artisan (Twitter)
